title: FS: Cobb, Hall of Famers, Chase ***Uzit, Lenox, American Beauty, Tolstoi+***
author: DerekMichael

posts.post_title: FS: Cobb, Hall of Famers, Chase ***Uzit, Lenox, American Beauty, Tolstoi+***
posts.post_content:
Hey Guys :)

I have a nice group of T206 available featuring some great Hall of Fame players including two Christy Mathewson as well as some quality exotic backs.

If you would like full scans, would like to submit an offer, or have any questions please feel free to shoot me a PM or send an email to: t206society@gmail.com and I will get back to you as soon as possible.

All pieces are offered o.b.o. and delivered to your door.

Thank you very much for your interest.

Derek

Chief Bender “pitching; trees in background” – Cycle 350 (PSA 6) …  SOLD

Hal Chase “portrait; blue background” – American Beauty 350 framed (SGC 1.5) …  $350

Ty Cobb "portrait - red" - Polar Bear (SGC A) ... SOLD

Christy Mathewson “portrait” – Sovereign 150 (SGC 2) …  $1650

Zack Wheat – Tolstoi (PSA 4.5) …  NO LONGER AVAILABLE

Zack Wheat – American Beauty 460 (PSA 3) …  SOLD

Barney Pelty "vertical" - Uzit (SGC 3.5) ... $5000

Ed Abbaticchio "blue sleeves" - Lenox (SGC 4) ... $3500

Cy Young "portrait" - Sovereign 150 ... SOLD

Hal Chase "portrait" - Tolstoi (SGC 2) ... $175

Hi guys.

I wanted to post a spoooooky Friday the 13th bump for this thread ;)

Lots of goodies available, so please feel free to drop me a PM or an email to: t206society@gmail.com  and submit offers at your leisure.

Thank you truly for your interest.

Derek
